doc:
Scott Aukerman https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Scott_Aukerman 0 Scott Aukerman (born July 2, 1970) is an American writer, actor, comedian, television personality, director, producer, and podcast host. Starting as a writer and performer in the later seasons of the sketch series Mr. Show, Aukerman is best known as the host of the weekly comedy podcast Comedy Bang! Bang! as well as the IFC original television series of the same name. Aukerman is the co-creator of Between Two Ferns with Zach Galifianakis and co-founder of the Earwolf podcast network. Scott_Aukerman ( born July_2_,_1970 ) is an_American_writer_,_actor_,_comedian_,_television_personality , director , producer , and podcast_host . Starting as a_writer_and_performer in the_later_seasons of the_sketch_series_Mr._Show , Aukerman is_best_known as the_host of the_weekly_comedy_podcast_Comedy_Bang ! Bang ! as_well as the_IFC_original_television_series of the_same_name . Aukerman is the_co-creator of Between_Two_Ferns with Zach_Galifianakis and co-founder of the_Earwolf_podcast_network .
